word_mean: 决定论：该理论认为所有现象都是先前存在的情况所造成，没有一件事是偶然发生的

sentence.Network_en: I don't believe in historical determinism.
Old - fashioned determinism was what we may call hard determinism.
sentence.Network_cn: 老式决定论是可称为刚性决定论的东西.

sentence.Network_en: The soft - determinist says, " No. " In fact, determinism is required for self - control.
sentence.Network_cn: 柔性决定论者回答说: “ 不是. ” 事实上, 自我 控制需要决定论.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 决定论（determinism）是所有学科研究的出发点。进行任何科学研究之前都必须首先假设，宇宙事物之间有一定的规律或法则可循。
... Bibliography 参考书目 Determinism 宿命论 Indeterminism 非决定论.
目前，数据率和确定性（determinism）可以作为划分接口的标准。确定性指的是接口在可预见的时间段内将数据从相机传输给计算机 …
强调实时作业特性，例如效能、延迟、决定性(determinism)以及最小机体尺寸。操作系统与核心之间的保护功能，包括激活、停止、 …

entry.tran: 决定论(认为一切行为和事件都具有不以人类意志为转移的必然性和因果制约性)
entry.def: Determinism is the belief that all actions and events result from other actions, events, or situations, so people cannot in fact choose what to do.

example.ex: I don't believe in historical determinism.

means.word_mean: 1. (philosophy) a philosophical theory holding that all events are inevitable consequences of antecedent sufficient causes; often understood as denying the possibility of free will

auth_sentence.content: It is bound by determinism just like everything else.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is bound by determinism just like everything else.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is bound by determinism just like everything else.

auth_sentence.content: The absense of classical determinism does not imply free-will.
auth_sentence.res_content: The absense of classical determinism does not imply free-will.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The absense of classical determinism does not imply free-will.

auth_sentence.content: If there was, it would clearly undermine determinism.
